main event: On June 12, 1957, a bright green-yellow object was observed moving in the sky over Milan, Italy.
interesting points: The object displayed flashing lights and changed direction slightly,The sighting lasted for 17 minutes,The witness noted the object followed a zigzag path at high speed before stopping,The estimated altitude of the object was about 5,000 feet,The object left behind two white vapor trails as it disappeared.
sighted object: a large bright round object glowing in a greenish glow
witness description: a 32-year-old foreign correspondent with an interest in meteorology
